sys_script.name: Increase Leave Taken By One

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_6640eb1e070050101039f6fd7c1ed0b2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_479478_employee_leaves</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_479478_employee_leaves">u_state=approved^EQ<item display_value="Approved" endquery="false" field="u_state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="approved"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Increase Leave Taken By One</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// 1. Create an object to store rows from a table
	var employees = new GlideRecord('x_479478_employee_employee');
	var leaves = new GlideRecord("x_479478_employee_leaves");
	
	// 2. Build query
	//employees.addQuery('u_name','=', current.u_name);

	// 3. Execute query 
	employees.query();
	leaves.query();
	
	//employees.setValue('u_leave_taken', employees.getValue('u_leave_taken') + 1);
	//employees.update();
	if (employees.next())
		employees.u_leave_taken += 1;
		employees.update();
	
	// 4. Process returned records
	if(employees.next() && leaves.next()){
		
		if (employees.getValue('number') == leaves.getValue('number'))
		{
			employees.setValue('u_leave_taken', employees.getValue('u_leave_taken') + 1);
		}

	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-10 23:39:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6640eb1e070050101039f6fd7c1ed0b2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Increase Leave Taken By One</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Employee" source="x_479478_employee">600534b107cc10101039f6fd7c1ed00d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee">600534b107cc10101039f6fd7c1ed00d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6640eb1e070050101039f6fd7c1ed0b2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-04-13 15:16:25</sys_updated_on><template>u_state=approved^EQ</template><when>before_display</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6640eb1e070050101039f6fd7c1ed0b2"/></record_update>
